summary.summary: Data engineer and software developer with experience building production-scale data pipelines, analytics systems, and backend services. Skilled in Python, SQL, cloud deployment, and machine learning, with a strong background in designing high-performance data warehouses, real-time systems, and scalable microservices.

experience.experience_1_title_company_location: Software Developer Intern, Dev Global Services, Vijayawada, India
experience_1_bullets: Built production data pipeline using Python and FastAPI processing 10K+ daily API requests with sub-100ms latency, supporting real-time enrollment analytics for 500+ concurrent users across 3 academic departments
Optimized PostgreSQL performance via indexing and SQL tuning, reducing data retrieval latency by 40% and enabling instant search across 10K+ student records
Architected and deployed microservices backend with 99.9% uptime and zero-downtime deployments, ensuring data quality and system reliability for critical enrollment workflows
Collaborated with 4 engineers in Agile environment, aligning with product stakeholders on data requirements and maintaining 85%+ test coverage through CI/CD integration
experience.experience_2_title_company_location: UX Design & Web Development Volunteer, University of Florida
experience_2_bullets: Partnered with team of engineers and faculty to architect data warehouse for Yantra educational platform, conducting user research with 50+ students to drive data-informed design decisions
Designed analytics dashboards using React.js and PostgreSQL to extract insights from engagement data, enabling instructors to optimize content for 1K+ users
Performed SQL-based user behavior analysis, identifying friction points that improved navigation efficiency by 35%

project_1_bullets: Architected end-to-end data warehouse and ETL pipeline using Python processing 100K+ e-commerce transactions across 3 years of marketplace data
Deployed analytics system on AWS EC2 with automated data quality monitoring, reducing analyst query time by 20% through SQL optimization
Developed machine learning model with R² = 0.96 for predictive analytics using 5+ engineered features to generate insights for seller performance and logistics
Managed data warehouse production workflows serving 10K+ daily queries with <0.1% error rate for real-time dashboards
project_2_bullets: Built scalable backend data pipeline using Node.js and MongoDB supporting 100+ concurrent users, reducing query response times by 35% through indexing strategies
Integrated Python-based ML model via REST API achieving 93% classification accuracy, collaborating with frontend team to define data interfaces
Architected MongoDB schema with strategic indexing to support real-time auction workflows and secure authentication processes

education.masters_coursework: Data Engineering, Advanced Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Systems, NLP, Machine Learning

achievements_bullets: Presented machine learning solution at HERE Technologies Hackathon on Land and House Price Prediction, demonstrating predictive analytics and problem-solving skills
Awarded USD 4,500 scholarship during Master's at University of Florida and a 25% merit scholarship during undergraduate studies
